divs: sighting detailsmy spouse, friend david & i were sitting on my patio conversing between approximately 10:00 pm and 12:00 midnight on or about june 22, 2007. the vantage point from my patio is approximately 100 degrees over the high desert from an altitude of 5,100 ft above sea level. my view is from approximately 10 to 15 degrees from west of north to directly south (north west to south). at approximately 11:00 pm, david, who was seated at the patio table facing north) commented on a dark object with a series horizontal of lights that were parallel to the ground. the object was about 10 degrees west of north and appeared just over the roofline of my neightbor's home next door (toward the north. the lights appeared to be evenly spaced and parallel to the roofline. after approximately 10 seconds, the lights disappeared. about 3 to 5 minutes later, i saw the same lights, only directly north and just east of my neighbor's house where there was no obstructed view of the object desert floor below. when i initially saw the object, the lights (pure white, almost bright) were stationery and did not move. after about 15 seconds of viewing, the lights either went off one-by-one in a syncronized fashion (from left to right) or they began to slowly rotate in a counter-clockwise direction at a slow speed. i say this beacuse i could never clearly see the shape or perimeter of the object. the moon was in a new phse and there was little ambient light in the vicinity. the lights appeared to either go off, then on or rotate in a counter-clockwise direction for approximately 30 to 45 seconds. the it appeared as though the direction of the lights' rotation (or sequence of being activated\deactived) reversed to a clockwise direction. this continued for about another minute to one & one half minutes and the lights totally extinguished, never to be seen again. although i failed to count the lights, i am estimating there were 15 to 20 in all. while i witnessed, along with my wife and david. the object moved very slowly toward the east over el mirage dry lake bed. not able to see the object's perimeter or shape with any certaintly, it was almost impossible to guage its distance away from me, as well as its lateral movement. for the sake of an estimate, i'm guessing that the lights were about 800 to 1000 feet off of the desert floor and its overall easterly movement approximately 3 to 5 miles. for clarification, the lights appeared to be components of a single craft due to the fact that they were evenly dispersed laterally and the same altitude from ground level, moving the then same direction & speed at all times. when looking around the lights (attempting to determine the object's perimeter\shape\size), there was no visable detail from the hills or terrain behind the object nor any stars behind\above it were visable at all, it was pure black. i have never witnessed anything like this before, nor had my friend david or my wife. we are 100% certain that we did witness a ufo. the question is whether it was controlled by extra-terestrials or the local government (right next door to edwards afb). purley amazing. ps: my camera batteries were dead or i would have grabbed it and taken photos!
Summary: Very large dark object hovering over the dry lake bed near El Mirage CA
trends: There have been no other sightings in El Mirage dry lake bed
